name: To The BEAT!
description:
To The Beat is a short rythm game where blocks *switch to the beat*

*DISCLAIMER* Music gets out of sync easily, so mute music (press M) for the best expereince.

The game was made in one week for the GeoJam 2021 with the theme of switch.

The game is short because I ran out of time.

*will be updated post jam*

Music by Spacespy :)

Made with love
